unnormalised: Mumbai, October 26th - The Diwali dhamaka is about to explode! Bollywood is unleashing a barrage of films, so prepare for ticket queues longer than the line for pani puri at Elphinstone station.
normalised: Mumbai, October twenty sixth - The Diwali dhamaka is about to explode! Bollywood is unleashing a barrage of films, so prepare for ticket queues longer than the line for pani puri at Elphinstone station.

unnormalised: First up, we have "Prem's Revenge," a romantic saga where apparently, Prem takes revenge... with love? Sources say expect 3 hours of singing around trees.
normalised: First up, we have "Prem's Revenge," a romantic saga where apparently, Prem takes revenge... with love? Sources say expect three hours of singing around trees.

unnormalised: Then there's "Dangal 2: Electric Boogaloo," a sequel nobody asked for, but hey, who are we to question the Rs. 200 crore opening weekend it's inevitably going to get? Screening begins at 09:00 hrs sharp!
normalised: Then there's "Dangal two: Electric Boogaloo," a sequel nobody asked for, but hey, who are we to question the rupee two hundred crore opening weekend it's inevitably going to get? Screening begins at nine zero zero hours sharp!

unnormalised: Finally, for the arthouse crowd, "The Loneliness of a Samosa," a poignant tale of a deep-fried pastry's existential crisis. Released on 27/10/2024. Bring tissues. And maybe some chutney.
normalised: Finally, for the art house crowd, "The Loneliness of a Samosa," a poignant tale of a deep-fried pastry's existential crisis. Released on twenty seventh October two thousand and twenty four. Bring tissues. And maybe some chutney.

unnormalised: Rumor has it that Karan Johar's next directorial venture might be released on 15/08/2025.
normalised: Rumor has it that Karan Johar's next directorial venture might be released on fifteenth August two thousand and twenty five.

unnormalised: This Diwali, your wallet will be lighter than a politician's promise. All that remains to be seen is who will win the Box-Office clash. The action starts NOW, starting at 14:00 hrs.
normalised: This Diwali, your wallet will be lighter than a politician's promise. All that remains to be seen is who will win the Box-Office clash. The action starts NOW, starting at fourteen zero zero hours.
